title: Uber users in the United States 2017 , by device
summary: This bar chart has 4 columns on the x axis representing Device, and Number of visits in each Device on the y axis.
Device Smartphone has the highest Number of visits and Tablet has the lowest Number of visits.
The maximum Device Smartphone has got 14.75 times higher Number of visits than the minimum Device Tablet.
min_summary: This bar chart has 4 columns on the x axis representing Device, and Number of visits in each Device on the y axis.
The Number of visits is highest at Device Smartphone and lowest at Device Tablet.
mid_summary: This bar chart has 4 columns on the x axis representing Device, and Number of visits in each Device on the y axis.
Device Smartphone has the highest Number of visits and Tablet has the lowest Number of visits.
The maximum Device Smartphone has got 14.75 times higher Number of visits than the minimum Device Tablet.
max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of visits for 4 number of Devices.
The Number of visits is appeared to be the highest at Device Smartphone and lowest at Device Tablet.
Second maximum Number of visits is found at Device Mobile-only.
The highest Device Smartphone has 16.5 more Number of visits than the lowest Device Tablet.
Device Smartphone is higher than any other Devices with value 17.7, followed by Mobile-only, and Desktop. Down to Device Tablet with the lowest value 1.2.
The Device Smartphone tends to be 1.67 percent higher than average.
Summing up the values of all Devices, we get total 42.3.
